message: Has anyone got any suggestions for which plugins to use?
In other words, do you know if I can use it programmatically? Can't find it on their site.
http://nivo.dev7studios.com/ here is an awesome image slider, i am sure you can change it to use a dropdown
@italiano40 Thanks, it looks nice! But I'm not sure if it has any functions I can use to tell it which image to load? I'd like to use it for previewing fonts in a dropdown.

@koopa58 if you look in the source code, those dots which is what you want to replace, you can just over write them using a dropdown box, then using JQuery connect it to a calling a link so it can switch the image that is all you have to do and here i kinda started to hack on it already https://gist.github.com/937097
that is a part of the unpack source code that i changed
@italiano40 Great, thank you for your time and example! This could work yes, I'll try it out from your example and let you know.
@koopa58 yea no problem it would take a little more time but you can make it happen
oops, posted to wrong topic! Sorry am testing api.
